title: Long Queue Times
body: Someone tell me that Im not the only one with this problem. I enter solo queue for a game of normals, I begin the normal wait, Until I get to about 5 minutes in the queue and I realise this is taking a while, So I give it some time, alot of time. I end up cancelling the queue due to having a wait time of 14 Minutes when the expected queue time was 3 minutes (This soon jumped to 7 minutes) Is anyone else having this problem? Im sick and tired of doing Aram Queue (It also happens on Aram just smaller wait times) {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
u can get 4 minutes in silver.. if u click fill ull instantly get placed as a support because every no noobs play it in silver..frustrating supporting some spas that doesnt know when to engage as an adc. really really really hurts me..
just waited 15 minutes to play jnugle or bot/ mid or bot/ top or mid/ click fill instantly dropped into a game as a support with what i like to refer to as a poke eater of an adc.. 
then they sit there and go ur not doing anything im getting pumped..id pay to get to gold got dropped because i didnt play for 3 months..climbing back through the dromes and tards back to gold 4 time on promos wait for someone to throw the game..

Im currently sitting in a low bronze queue (top,adc) for 25min. Sunday afternoon. estimated time 2.45.

Not as bad as yesterday which took 45min

http://prntscr.com/6gjysy

Damn LoL.. why no play?

lol.. it goes back to zero after an hour.. 
http://prntscr.com/6gk3xo
Do you get this happening to you at a time like now, 4pm-8pm?
There are significantly less players on during the morning, so matching making will take longer to find players matching your MMR.
